twoSetSkill.name: Indomitable 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Front-side hits taken by the host deal 80% less Physical DMG. Attacks from other directions deal 40% more Physical DMG. Frontal attack DMG reduction does not apply for a 20s period after evasion.

threeSetSkill.name: Vidyaraja 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Upon entering battle, acquire Might of the Vidyaraja, gaining 40% Physical DMG and 60% DEF for 20s. CD: 60s.
